name: Slumberhunt
description:
It's late on a school night and you can't sleep. To cure your boredom, you have decided to do some stuff around the house. But be careful, Mother is sleeping in the other room. Sneak around while completing your tasks and make as little noise as possible.

This game was made in 3 days for MiniJam 105: Dreamy

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Interact - Left Click
  • Sneak - Control
  • Run - Shift

Created by snerd for MiniJam 105: Dreamy

Fonts used (from dafont.com): 

  • Old Newspaper Times - Manfred Klien
  • Bad Signal - Woodcutter

Sounds effects from freesound.org

Menu ambience by Moulaythami from freesound.org
